content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = collect(replace(grep('```julia\n', md), '```julia\n', ''), '\n', '\n'))
    
    joined_code = join(code_blocks, '\n'))
    
    return joined_code
end
```
This function `extract_julia_code` takes a markdown document `md` as input. It then extracts all the code blocks that are written in Julia by searching for ````julia\n`. 

Next, it removes the code fence and replaces any consecutive newlines with a single newline.

Finally, it joins all the extracted code blocks together with a single newline and returns the resulting string.
